snippet: John J. Mack has joined the board of Lending Club, a start-up focused on peer-to-peer lending. He has continued to stay involved with financial services firms since leaving Morgan Stanley.
abstract: John J. Mack has joined the board of Lending Club, a start-up focused on peer-to-peer lending. He has continued to stay involved with financial services firms since leaving Morgan Stanley.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Keeping Busy, Mack Joins a New Board
